function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Problems around the opportunity costs of occupants spending 30 to 60 minutes filling in a questionnaire.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confounding factors such as industrial relations climate, staff morale, and personal issues influencing how occupants rate their workplace environment.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for complex multi-modal interactions that impact occupants in actual office buildings when assessing environmental conditions.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependent variables like cognitive performance impacting scientific evidence","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of standardized poe protocol for occupant surveys","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aggressive pursuit of certification from ieq accreditation schemes leading to performance-focused decisions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctance of building operators to relax control may hinder the implementation of measures to mitigate contagious diseases propagation in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tardy adoption of new technologies and slow uptake in the buildings sector may result in inadequate measures to address contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited control of tenants over indoor environmental quality may lead to suboptimal conditions for mitigating contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Subjective evaluations of indoor environments by occupants may not align with objective measures, leading to discrepancies in assessing indoor environmental quality.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Narrow control clauses in commercial office tenancy agreements may lead to suboptimal indoor temperature management, potentially impacting occupant comfort and energy efficiency.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Democratization of analytics for non-experts through easy-to-use web tools and dashboards","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on big data leading to prioritization of data-driven research over traditional scientific method","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growth of iot and wsn implementation without harmonization of noninteroperable technologies and protocols.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry-driven development of business intelligence and analytics bia tools without significant academic input.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dense distribution of sensing devices increases the risk of pathogen spread in case of contamination.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wireless transmission of data between nodes may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases if nodes are contaminated.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Largescale deployment of wsn without proper security measures may lead to unauthorized access and potential malicious interference, including spreading malware or viruses.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of network-addressable devices embedded in everyday objects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Number of connected devices to reach over 20 billion \n'things' by 2020","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of off-the-shelf transducers may lead to inaccuracies in data collection for thermal comfort field studies.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited scale and scope of proof-of-concept or project-specific ieq monitoring systems may hinder their widespread implementation in built environments.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in technological context to low-cost hardware and open-source software may introduce cybersecurity vulnerabilities in ieq monitoring systems.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient ieq monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate measurement of indoor environmental quality ieq","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of outdated comfort assessment systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate health policymaking in china and elsewhere","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on curbing climate change","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of concern for the health of the environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between air pollution and human illness","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven spatial coverage and limited spatial coverage of traditional ground stations may lead to incomplete representation of pollution levels experienced by populations in their proximity.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through literature search and review of covid-19 related materials.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data gap at the local level","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unfavorable conditions for humans due to changes in building openings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Leakage from temporary water supply points or improperly drained storm water","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in global wind patterns and increased rainfall can propagate the spread of malaria during the construction life cycle.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Placement and size of building openings affecting vector accessibility","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in warm or hot days coupled with flooding creating more breeding sites for mosquito larvae","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccuracy of information on wearing masks in coronavirus prevention articles","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias introduced by the use of buzzsumo in the study","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate information on masks and virus transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of social media platforms’ efforts to remove misinformation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low presence of accurate information in peer-reviewed journals and official institutions websites","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of false information about covid-19 prevention measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misleading articles on covid-19 prevention measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misleading articles about coronavirus prevention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Excessive reliance on non-affiliated and non-peer reviewed sources","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionate sharing of inaccurate information on social media platforms","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disagreements and doubts in the classification process","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of accurate and misleading articles using chi-square test","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"}]}
